commit message:
Merge pull request #17 from RyDroid/fr

Adding french translation

updated build configuration to use projects generated by
gradle-eclipse-aar plugin

code cleanup, added comments, and updated code to use latest Xtendroid
features
added more material design, theme still wip
fixed webapp id getting mixed up with listview position
added displaying of favicon in actionbar
implemented saving and loading of favicons
allowing DOM storage so that sites can save preferences
allowing DOM storage for sites to be able to save preferences
ability to add shortcuts, with favicon

added missing strings to french translation - still needs to be
translated though
improved handling of favicon on newly saved apps
changed handling of 3rd party domains - now saves immediately
moved out french translation as it is incomplete
removed apk from github as it is available on play store and f-droid
